name: Enter the diceon
description:
Don't let they roll YOU! How long can you survive?

Fullscreen important!

Controlls:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Speed up: Shift  + WASD
  • Shoot: Leftclick
  • Super shot: Spacebar to activate then shoot (with 15s cooldown!)
  • Exit: ESC

My first game for a game jam!
